definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: Zeus stabs the sky with thunderbolts.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯用雷電刺穿了天空。

sentences.english: Don Fernando gave me a look that seemed to bore a hole in me.
sentences.chinese: 費南多先生甩了我一眼，眼神犀利好像要刺穿我身體。

sentences.english: He transfixed the enemy's heart with a spear.
sentences.chinese: 他用長矛刺穿了敵人的心臟。

sentences.english: He fell out of the window and was impaled on the iron railings.
sentences.chinese: 他從窗口跌下去，身體被鐵欄杆刺穿了。

sentences.english: Let the captains of the hosts pierce her with their swords, let them crush her beneath their shields.
sentences.chinese: 讓指揮千軍萬馬的將軍們用劍刺穿她，用盾壓碎她。

sentences.english: The insect's sting penetrates the surface of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 昆蟲的螫針能夠刺穿皮膚的表層。

sentences.english: They say the nightingale pierces his bosom with a thorn when he sings his love song.
sentences.chinese: 他們說夜鶯唱出戀歌時，用荊棘刺穿自己的胸膛。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Sword, This screen saver depicts sword actions like chopping, piercing, snapping and pointing.
sentences.chinese: 這個屏幕保護程序描繪擊劍運動，刺穿，猛咬和削尖。

sentences.english: It seemed her heart was transfixed with the swords of her dolours.
sentences.chinese: 她的心似乎已經被幾把憂傷之劍刺穿了。

sentences.english: If there is a wind, it knifes through your skin like stilettos.
sentences.chinese: 如果有風，也會如錐子一般刺穿你的皮膚。

sentences.english: Let one's soul be pierced and cleansed , again and again.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，讓靈魂一次又一次被美麗刺穿，盪滌。

sentences.english: He ran a sword through the tyrant.
The broken ribs perforated into his lung.
sentences.chinese: 折斷的肋骨刺穿了他的肺。

sentences.english: Take off pedals, wheel skewers and anything else pointy that may puncture the box.
sentences.chinese: 取下踏板，車輪橫杆及其他任何尖銳物以防刺穿盒子。

sentences.english: Heused the lance to pierce on cross Ye to be crisp, blood four class.
sentences.chinese: 他用長矛刺穿了十字架上的耶酥，鮮血四流。

sentences.english: Conservative cartoonists are struggling to pierce Mr Obama's armour.
sentences.chinese: 保守派漫畫家正在努力刺穿奧巴馬的保護甲。

definition: to hit with a piercing blow
to penetrate/to pierce/to see clearly/to have an insight into
to cut open/to rip/to streak across (lightning, meteor etc)/to pierce (scream, searchlight etc)
to cleave/to split open/to spread open (fingers, legs)
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
to insert/to stick in/to plug in (an electronic device)
